'''Freckle Huang''' is the leader of the [[Treasure Hoarders]] in [[Liyue]]. He is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in [[Guizhong (Archon Quest)|Guizhong]], and is defeated during the course of the quest. Beyond that, nothing is known of his origins, or how he became the leader of Liyue's Treasure Hoarders.
